com.ephesoft.dcma.da.dao

Interface ServiceStatusDao

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Dao<ServiceStatus>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServiceStatusDaoImpl

    public interface ServiceStatusDao
extends Dao<ServiceStatus>
    The ServiceStatusDao interface provides operations to be performed on ServiceStatus table like CRUD operations, checking which Ephesoft services is under which server.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft
    See Also:
    ServiceStatus, Dao, ServiceType

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<ServiceStatus> getServiceStatusList(ServiceType serviceType)
      To get the service status list for the given service type, which should ideally return a list of only one element or an empty list.
      java.util.List<ServiceStatus> getServiceStatusListForServer(ServerRegistry serverRegistry, ServiceType serviceType)
      To get the service status list for a given server and service type,which should ideally return a list of only one element or an empty list.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.ephesoft.dcma.core.dao.Dao

        count, countAll, create, evict, get, getAll, merge, remove, removeAll, saveOrUpdate

    • Method Detail

      • getServiceStatusList

        java.util.List<ServiceStatus> getServiceStatusList(ServiceType serviceType)
        To get the service status list for the given service type, which should ideally return a list of only one element or an empty list. A service can be registered only under one server which is the desired functionality. This is used initially by the server to know whether given service responsibility is taken by the some other server or not.
        Parameters:
        serviceType - ServiceType type of service type.
        Returns:
        List<ServiceStatus> list of service status.

      • getServiceStatusListForServer

        java.util.List<ServiceStatus> getServiceStatusListForServer(ServerRegistry serverRegistry,
                                                          ServiceType serviceType)
        To get the service status list for a given server and service type,which should ideally return a list of only one element or an empty list. A service can be registered only under one server which is the desired functionality. This is used to at the start of service to check whether it can go on or not.
        Parameters:
        serverRegistry - ServerRegistry server for which service status is to be checked.
        serviceType - ServiceType type of service to be checked.
        Returns:
        List<ServiceStatus> list of service status.
